definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
Sense and Sensibility, novel by Jane Austen 珍·奧斯汀|珍·奥斯汀[Zhen1 · Ao4 si1 ting1]

sentences.english: Some desires are formed as the result of rational thought pro-  cesses.
sentences.chinese: 有些欲望在理性的思考后产生。

sentences.english: Rational selfinterest is not always the dominating factor.
sentences.chinese: 理性的个体利益不总是占上风的因素。

sentences.english: The third part is the guarantee of the rationality of free proof system.
sentences.chinese: 第三章为保障自由心证合理性的具体制度考察。

sentences.english: Kant was the first definitely to signalize the distinction between Reason and Understanding.
sentences.chinese: 康德最早明确提出知性和理性的区别。

sentences.english: An understanding heart gives you empathy and compassion for others.
sentences.chinese: 一个有理性的新会给你情感和怜悯之心。

sentences.english: The simulation enunciates the validity of the model and the reasonableness of the PRF precision requirement.
sentences.chinese: 仿真验证了模型的有效性和要求的合理性。

sentences.english: Thus it is more suitable to regard Gan as a sub-category under the Hakka-Gan dialect.
sentences.chinese: 把赣方言看成是客赣语的一个次方言更有其合理性。

sentences.english: That is actually quite a rationalistic claim.
sentences.chinese: 这其实是一种理性主义的观点。

sentences.english: Conclusions There is pathological oxygen supply dependance in the patients with several congenital cardiac disease.
sentences.chinese: 结论重症先天性心脏病手术期间存在病理性氧供依赖。

sentences.english: Plutarch also recorded a number of physical characteristics about the pneuma.
sentences.chinese: 普鲁塔克还记录了灵气的一些物理性质。

sentences.english: The rationalist finally will be of dogmatic temper in his affirmations .
sentences.chinese: 最后，理性主义者在断言时总带些武断性的气质。

sentences.english: Fine lines on the palm mean you think clearly and rationally.
sentences.chinese: 手掌纹路清晰的人，代表着思考清楚而理性。

sentences.english: Sensitivity and rationality, just like life and death, are complicated issues in life.
sentences.chinese: 感性与理性就如同生与死是人生一道难解的命题。

sentences.english: Rationalistic tradition had been from Ancient Greek in western philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 理性主义传统在西方可谓源远流长。

sentences.english: I could not control and make self-repression on such rational basic.
sentences.chinese: 我做不到这么理性的克制和压抑自我。

sentences.english: The diol chain-extension agent is an important factor influencing the physical performance of TPU.
sentences.chinese: 二醇扩链剂是影响TPU物理性能的一个重要因素。

definition: to follow blindly/to conform slavishly/unthinking obedience
to act impetuously (idiom); on an impulse
Sense and Sensibility, novel by Jane Austen 珍·奧斯汀|珍·奥斯汀[Zhen1 · Ao4 si1 ting1]
human nature/humanity/human/the totality of human attributes
